name: Employee Portal
description: An employee portal app is a digital platform designed to streamline communication, collaboration, and management tasks within an organization.

name: Stock Overflow
description: The Stack Overflow app is a mobile application that provides access to Stack Overflow, a popular online community and Q&A platform for developers and programmers

name: Skills Management
description: Skills management is the process of identifying, developing, and utilizing the skills of employees within an organization.
